name: markdown-it-preview
description: Markdown Preview that supports MarkdownIt plugins on a per-project basis.

liveUpdate.description: Re-render the preview as the contents of the source changes, without requiring the source buffer to be saved. If disabled, the preview is re-rendered only when the buffer is saved to disk.

openPreviewInSplitPane.description: Open the preview in a split pane. If disabled, the preview is opened in a new tab in the same pane.

grammars.description: List of scopes for languages for which previewing is enabled. See [this README](https://github.com/atom/spell-check#spell-check-package-) for more information on finding the correct scope for a specific language.

useGitHubStyle.title: Use GitHub.com style
useGitHubStyle.description: Use the same CSS styles for preview as the ones used on GitHub.com.

generateXHTMLOutput.title: Generate valid XHTML output
generateXHTMLOutput.description: Explicitly close all self-closing HTML tags.

convertNewlinesToBRTags.title: Convert newlines to BR tags
convertNewlinesToBRTags.description: Convert newlines in paragraphs into BR tags.

languagePrefix.title: Language prefix
languagePrefix.description: CSS language prefix for fenced blocks. Can be useful for external highlighters.

createLinksFromURLs.title: Create links from URLs
createLinksFromURLs.description: Create A tags from URL-like text.

enableTypographer.title: Enable typographer
enableTypographer.description: Enable some language-neutral replacement and quotes beautification.

quotationCharacters.title: Quotation characters
quotationCharacters.description: Double and single quotes replacement pairs, when typographer enabled, and smartquotes on.
